## IGlTransformBinder.swapBuffers() method

Swap their buffers with ours, using their buffers as inputs and ours as outputs.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
swapBuffers(binder: TSwapBinder): void;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  binder | TSwapBinder |  |

<b>Returns:</b>
